name: MoneyMe for Windows
short_description:
MoneyMe can keep track of your money, your debts and coupons.
It is totally free and get everything you need to have at all times, with statistics, reports and continuous development you do everything you expect from a finance program. 

MoneyMe has the following characteristics:

. Manage your expenses and income
. Statistics of various formats for analysis
. Manage debts
· Synchronizing Accounts, to synchronize accounts on multiple devices
. Add an expense or income with widgets or shortcuts
. Create categories to your taste
. You can group categories
. Reports of various types
. Create budgets
. Online Backups
. Transfers between accounts
. Export to CSV
. Coupons organizer
. Totally free

Do you need help to track your money?

Enjoy our program!
summary: MoneyMe can help you controlling your expenses and income for free.
